website_summaries.verdict: This 14" crash produces a bright and cutting sound perfect for accenting. Sturdier than other thin cymbals, and cheaper than high end models without affecting quality.
pros: Crafted from B8 bronze (92% copper, 8% tin), this cymbal is fast and punchy and it cuts through the mix well
Ideal for accenting parts, the tonal quality is bright and tight
cons: Because of its thin weight, it is prone to splitting quicker than heavier cymbals

customer_reviews.title: counterfeit sabian cymbal received from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: The Cymbal received is totally different to the one shown on the website. The received Cymbal does not have any SABIAN marking on the top surface of the cymbal. Only BX8 marking is there on top of the cymbal. This does not sound as good, as may be the genuine SABIAN BX8 shown on the website. People have highest expectations from none other than AMAZON.COM, burt even AMAZON.com can ditch its customers, albeit occasionally by dispatching counterfeit stuff to them. I feel dejected after getting ditched by this leading e-commerce website. I can shre the photo of the received Cymbal as well. It sounds DUD. Disgusting Experience. I burnt my hard earned money. Vipin Rishiraj 9316102295 Panchkula, INDIA
customer_reviews.author: Vipin Rishiraj

customer_reviews.title: photo is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: photo shows the cymbal with the "old" Sabian logo....which is what I wanted. The cymbal I received had the "new" Sabian logo which looks like it was designed by a 4th grader.
customer_reviews.author: av8r567

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light sound, does not require as hard of a hit for good sound.  Great for smaller venues.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a crash cymbal that had a lighter sound, and not need to be hit quite as hard, for small venues. I'm using this with my Gretsch Catalina Club Street kit, and this worked out great for that.
customer_reviews.author: R Crosier

customer_reviews.title: This cymbal is nice. The color is very brassy looking and totally ...
customer_reviews.text: This cymbal is nice. The color is very brassy looking and totally different than usual cymbals. It has a nice tone although I thought the sustain was a little long for a Thin Crash.
customer_reviews.author: KARLA J.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent crash given the price range. Quick decay, also cuts through sonically.
customer_reviews.author: Your Favorite Pun

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this to be top of the line. It sounds great in a recording on the YouTube videos, but in person it is very tinny sounding. I kind of feel the original b8 series is better than the b8x.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Sabian has me sold
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, crisp, clean, quick attack, fast decay. If you're a drummer you'll know exactly what I mean. I really like Sabian cymbals. I will be buying more in the future. It compliments my Z crash
customer_reviews.author: Inspector 12

customer_reviews.title: Great little crash.
customer_reviews.text: Great cymbal with crisp and quick sustain, exactly what I needed. Looks great and hopefully will endure for a long time. I use all Sabian and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cobra2

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great budget cymbal! It has a great, solid sound. It is perfect for someone that wants a brighter, quick sound. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: 14" cymbal
customer_reviews.text: been using sabian cymbals for the past few years. never fail to produce the type of sound in metal music. will use sabian as long as its still great. durability is long serving too.
customer_reviews.author: Faiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: do i have the sabian 16-inch b8x thin crash on my order
customer_reviews.author: Jules moore

product_meta.title: Sabian B8X 14" Thin Crash Cymbal
product_meta.description: Color:BrassFast, punchy, bright and loud attack makes this a cutting crash.
feature_bullets: B8X cymbals are hammered for more projection and complexity than any other B8
These cymbals ensure you’ll get noticed on stage
Fast, punchy, bright and loud attack make the SABIAN 14" B8X Thin Crash a cutting model
Precision formed, hammered and lathed for pure, tonally tight sounds, B8X is the bright, cutting sound of pure Bronze
